Subject: Bombing Run
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Unitron:



Unitron, in his space fighter mode, hovered over Mt. St. Hilary, transforming 
to his biped mode, landing on somewhat flat surface that he would fit on.

"Mt. St. Hilary, the very mountain the Ark crashed into so long ago.  If it's 
destroyed...the possibilities for my lord and I are endless!" he leapt into 
the large hole of the volcano, his feet boosters slowing his descent to a 
safe speed, landing on a solid piece of rocky ground.
